'''Catherine Ã‰lise "Cate" Blanchett''' (born 1969) played [[Galadriel]] in both [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|''The Lord of the Rings'']], and [[The Hobbit (film series)|''The Hobbit'' film series]].

==Filmography==
* [[2001]]: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]'' - [[Galadriel]]
* [[2002]]: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers]]'' - [[Galadriel]]
* [[2003]]: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King]]'' - [[Galadriel]]
* [[2012]]: ''[[The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey]]'' - [[Galadriel]]
* [[2013]]: ''[[The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug]]'' - [[Galadriel]]
* [[2014]]: ''[[The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies]]'' - [[Galadriel]]

==Quotes==
{{quote|I'm really looking forward to it, because it's not a territory I've ever stepped into before technically.|Cate Blanchett, Vogue Magazine}}
{{quote|I basically did it so I could have the ears. They were so sweet, because they actually made little bronze castings of my ears. I loved all of that stuff|Cate Blanchett, DarkHorizons.com}}
{{quote|She's handing on the torch to Men, to humankind. I think in a lot of ways she's challenging the viewers to say, 'What are you gonna do with Middle-earth? What are you gonna do with Middle-earth?'|Cate Blanchett about Galadriel, lordoftherings.net}}

==Awards==

* 2004 - '''NBR Award''', Best Acting by an Ensemble, ''Peter Jackson's The Return of the King''
* 2004 - '''[http://www.sagawards.org/ SAG Award]''', Outstanding Performance by a Cast in a Motion Picture, ''Peter Jackson's The Return of the King''
